anathema: Educate the uninitiated in sacred rites, betray loved ones or family, discriminate based on social class
edict: Provide aid to the sick and wounded, use magic to help others, mourn the cherished dead, ritually purify yourself before entering sacred areas
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Restricted">[Isis (Queen of Miracles)](/Deities.aspx?ID=517)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 312

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Dead or Missing Deities](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=34)

**Edicts** Provide aid to the sick and wounded, use magic to help others, mourn the cherished dead, ritually purify yourself before entering sacred areas

**Anathema** Educate the uninitiated in sacred rites, betray loved ones or family, discriminate based on social class

**Area of Concern**
Fertility, magic, motherhood, rebirth

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Wisdom or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** must choose holy

**Divine Skill** [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=35)

**Favored Weapon** [Staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=367)

**Domains** [Family](/Domains.aspx?ID=74), [Healing](/Domains.aspx?ID=78), [Magic](/Domains.aspx?ID=82), [Passion](/Domains.aspx?ID=88)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Soothe](/Spells.aspx?ID=1678)

- **2nd**
[Humanoid Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=1560)

- **3rd**
[Animal Vision](/Spells.aspx?ID=1963)

- **4th**
[Creation](/Spells.aspx?ID=1477)

- **5th**
[Control Water](/Spells.aspx?ID=1473)

- **6th**
[Wall of Force](/Spells.aspx?ID=1749)

- **7th**
[Planar Palace](/Spells.aspx?ID=1634)

- **8th**
[Migration](/Spells.aspx?ID=1600)

- **9th**
[Metamorphosis](/Spells.aspx?ID=1599)

</column>
